Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.context

package com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel.context
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.kneelawk.knet.api.channel
     
  • Class
    Description
    CastChannelContext<PARENT,CHILD extends PARENT>
    Creates a channel context that casts the parent into the child.
    ChannelContext<C>
    Describes something capable of supplying context to a channel.
    ChildChannelContext<PARENT,CHILD,PAYLOAD>
    A channel context that wraps another channel context, extracting extra information from it.
    ChildContextDecoder<PARENT,CHILD,PAYLOAD>
    Used for finding a child in a parent given the information in a payload.
    ChildContextFinder<PARENT,CHILD>
    Used for getting child context from a parent context.
    ContextDecoder<C,P>
    Used for decoding context from a payload.
    ContextEncoder<C,P>
    Encodes context into a payload.
    ContextualChannel<C,P>
    Describes a channel that sends and receives contextual payloads.
    ContextualPayloadHandler<C,P>
    Handles a contextual payload.
    ParentContextFinder<PARENT,CHILD>
    Gets the parent context when given a child context.
    PayloadCodec<P>
    A codec for a contextual payload.
    RootChannelContext<C,P>
    A channel context that supplies a context object but has no parents.
    SimpleChildChannelContext<PARENT,CHILD>
    Like a ChildChannelContext, wrapping another channel context, extracting more detailed context from it.
